name: Pineapple Surprise Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Pineapple Surprise Recipe: Pineapple Chunks (chopped) 1 tin Pineapple Jelly 1 packet Cream (whipped) 2 cups Condense Milk 1 tin Pineapple Essence few drops China grass 1 tsp Glazed Cherries for decoration Whipped Cream for garnishing Vanilla Ice Cream (whipped) ½ box
instructions: Finally choparized pineapple cook pineapple jelly and china grass in 1 cup water, remove mix in condense milk 1 ½ cup whipped cream, ice cream, essence and choparized pineapple mix all well remove in a bowl leave it to set. Decorate with whipped cream and glaze cherry serve chilled.
